hooks.example: /** * Filter gravityview_get_entries * * @param array $parameters Array with search_criteria, sorting and paging keys. * @param array $args View configuration args. * @param int $ $id View id * @param int $ $page_size Number of entries to show per page * @param string $ $sort_field Form field id to sort * @param string $ $sort_direction Sorting direction ('ASC', 'DESC', or 'RAND') * @param string $ $start_date - Ymd * @param string $ $end_date - Ymd * @param string $ $class - assign a html class to the view * @param string $ $offset (optional) - This is the start point in the current data set (0 index based). * @param int $form_id ID of Gravity Forms form * @return array Modified parameters */ add_filter( 'gravityview_get_entries', 'my_custom_gravityview_get_entries_filter', 10, 11 ); function my_custom_gravityview_get_entries_filter($parameters, $args, $ $id, $ $page_size, $ $sort_field, $ $sort_direction, $ $start_date, $ $end_date, $ $class, $ $offset, $form_id) { // Modify $parameters as needed return $parameters; }
